sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import blogs from "./blogs"; import "./Blogdetails.css"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; const Blogdetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const blog = blogs[id]; return ( <> Blog Details - GDSC
Blog Details
<>

{blog.name}

{`Author - ${blog.author}`}
{`${blog.date} | ${blog.read} read`}
{blog.about}
{blog.resources}
); }; export default Blogdetails;
